name: TranslateMedia
tag_list: translation-agency, localisation, localization, translation, transcreation, adaptation, translate, translator, global-campaign, translate-media, translation-online, lost-in-translation
overview:
TranslateMedia is an award winning translations agency with offices in London, Paris, New York, Hong Kong and Munich.

The company specialises in translations for global advertising and marketing agencies, telecom and technology companies, social network and e-commerce sites. The company employs more than 2000 translators covering over 55 languages and multiple specialisms.

TranslateMedia is one of only four agencies in the UK to have been awarded the European Standard EN 15038:2006 for quality assurance. The company is a member of the ATC (UK) and ATA (US).

A flash presentation about TranslateMedia’s online workflow platform, provided to clients free of charge, is available at this link:

http://www.translatemedia.co.uk/translation-management-workflow.html
